FluentCRM Developers Docs

Learn how to extend FluentCRM core to create new integrations or add custom functionalities to your CRM. Here you will find detailed documentation, handy code snippets and full code examples.

Architecture

Learn about FluentCRM Data Structure, Framework Basics and how internal Components work together.

  • Database Schema
  • Database Model Basics
  • Subscriber / Contact Model

Developer Hooks / Functions

FluentCRM offers numerous easy-to-use hooks, functions and PHP API to interact with it's data and underlying API. Learn more about them in the detailed sections

  • Action Hooks
  • Filter Hooks
  • Global Functions
  • Helper Classes
  • CLI

FluentCRM Modules

FluentCRM's modules are designed in a way that allows for easy extension, allowing you to build integrations in just a few hours(Not in days), and giving you full control of your data.

  • Automations Funnels Basic
  • Build Custom Automation Trigger
  • Build Custom Automation Action
  • Extend SmartCodes
  • Extend Contact's Profile Section
  • Extend REST API
